title: Just the job
creator_credit: Ron Saunders, Jenny Day and Soerabaia Pictures
brief_description: Designed as an aid for those who are about to leave school and try for a place in the work force. Outlines the kind of trade and post-trade courses available, as well as basic apprenticeship courses and development courses for various skills. Explains the need to find out as much as possible about a job, to ask questions, and talk to teachers.
